title: Site Topics
author: Anton
body:
I have an upcoming meeting with David today, and he told me to prepare a summary of our research focus on here and on Hunimal.org, and where other people could help.

The following are the main things we are working on:

  1. AI - modular, having memory, and capable of symbolic reasoning. Initially in the game playing space but later agent-based in a persistent environment, where people can create their own agents.
  2. Geometry-based game design - fun, STEM-themed games that explore mathematical concepts
  3. Cryptocurrency for the virtual world - our virtual agent creation world. According to Elon Musk, currency "should be viewed through the lens of information theory"; the goal of currency is not hoarding but efficient exchange promoting higher overall productivity.
  4. Neuroscience and neuroengineering - how do systems think? We want to break into this space.
  5. Robotics - David loaned me a Yahboom G1 tank robot and is building another one himself. These are autonomous agents in the real world (of amateur robotics).

That is just about all the areas I can think of.

Please let me know if you are intereseted in any of this stuff!
